name: Disneys Kim Possible - Global Gemini [NDS]
description:
When Gemini, aka Dr. Director, escapes from jail, it's up to you and Kim to prevent him from rebuilding his evil empire and brainwashing the noble staff of Global Justice stations around the world. Travel with Ron Stoppable and Rufus, his trusty naked mole rat, to the Swiss Alps, Egypt and the Pacific, and bring Gemini to justice!

Features

• Play as Kim Possible, Ron Stoppable or Rufus in a 3D action-packed adventure
• Bust out your most acrobatic kung-fu moves, drive extreme vehicles and dodge daunting obstacles on your globe-spanning quest
• Operate an octet of gadgets and unlock foxy fashions to gain amazing capabilities
• Multiplayer challenges include death-defying snowboard races and hair-raising vehicle chases
